senses.synonym: 00869874-n (the process of shedding tears (usually accompanied by sobs or other inarticulate sounds); \""I hate to hear the crying of a child\""; \""she was in tears\"");00716342-a (demanding attention; \""clamant needs\""; \""a crying need\""; \""regarded literary questions as exigent and momentous\""- H.L.Mencken; \""insistent hunger\""; \""an instant need\""
